newsitem.title: USA: PLC says heart laser is shown effective.
newsitem.headline: PLC says heart laser is shown effective.

text.p: A clinical study has shown PLC Systems Inc's C02 Heart Laser treatment is more effective than standard medical or drug therapy in patients with late-stage heart disease, the company said on Tuesday.

PLC said the U.S. Food and Drug Administration agreed to allow PLC to stop the randomization of patients to an arm of the study where they received medical therapy rather than the Heart Laser treatment.
In the randomized study, 71 percent of patients who received transmyocardial revascularization (TMR) using the Heart Laser showed a decrease of at least two angina classes.
